            if (event.indexh === 0) {

            } else {
              document.querySelector("div.slide-menu-button").style.display = "block";
            }
          });
          Reveal.addEventListener('slidechanged', (event) => {
            if (event.indexh === 0) {
              document.querySelector("div.slide-menu-button").style.display = "none";
            } else {
              document.querySelector("div.slide-menu-button").style.display = "block";
            }
          });
          </script>
